generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane paved road with visible lane markings, which is the primary surface for vehicle travel.
- building: Several buildings are visible in the background, including a tall structure on the left and other urban buildings along the roadside.
- wall: A long, light-colored concrete wall runs along the right side of the road, separating it from the adjacent area.
- fence: A metal fence is visible along the left side of the road, running parallel to the road.
- pole: Multiple streetlight poles are visible along the road, including ones on the left and right sides.
- vegetation: Trees and shrubs are visible in the background, particularly on the right side behind the wall.
- sky: The sky is visible above the road and buildings, appearing overcast and gray.
- car: A dark-colored car is visible ahead in the right lane, driving in the same direction.
- truck: A large snowplow truck is visible ahead in the right lane, actively clearing snow from the road.
- rider: The image is taken from inside a vehicle, implying the presence of a driver, which falls under the "rider" class as defined.
- person: No distinct individuals are visible walking or standing on the road or sidewalks; the only visible person is implied to be the driver of the vehicle.
